TopicTitle: Limit theory, a not-so-new space game I found!

Articles.Content: http://ltheory.com/ I find it very similar to space engine, havent tested it yes, but i already can see that its kinda unpopular

I think your statement is click bait.

LTheory is far from complete at the moment, it isn't intended to be Beta for at least another 2 months, when the first backers will be able to play it again.

The only releases before now have been the prototype, which is VERY far from final and that was only to a VERY limited number of people.

Limit Theory has a very different model to KSP. Where Josh (the developer) has not wanted to have people pay for the game before they can get their mits on it, except for the initial Kickstarter.
I`m looking forward to this game, so far it looks interesting, like SP version of EVE.
